properties.incident_details: Six robbers armed with long knives boarded the ship. Duty crew raised alarm. Robbers jumped overboard and escaped
Five robbers in a small boat attempted to board an anchored chemical tanker. The robbers had to abort their approach after alert duty watchmen noticed them.

Robbers armed with long knives boarded the ship waiting for pilot, unlatched the STBD life raft and threw it overboard.  They jumped overboard and escaped when spotted by crew members.  Incident was reported to the authorities
properties.consequences_for_crew_etc: Life raft stolen
properties.reported_to: Port authorities, Indonesian Navy HQ, Marine Police HQ, PUSKODAL and SAR, Jakarta

properties.incident_details: Third engineer on the ship noticed four armed robbers in the steering flat.  The bridge was informed, alarm raised, crew alerted and headcount taken.  Port control and local agents were informed of the incident.  A search carried out by the crew revealed nothing stolen
properties.reported_to: United Kingdom, Port Control, BAKORKAMLA Indonesia, PUSKODAL, Indonesian Navy Headquarters and SAR Jakarta

properties.incident_details: Two robbers were found in the ship's engine room The alarmed was raised and the robbers jumped overboard and escaped in a small boat
properties.consequences_for_crew_etc: Two reefer extention wires were stolen

properties.incident_details: Three robbers boarded the ship at anchor using hooks attached to ropes. They stole ship’s stores and escaped in a small boat
properties.consequences_for_crew_etc: Ship's stores stolen

properties.incident_details: Two robbers boarded the ship at anchor. Duty crew spotted the robbers and raised the alarm. The robbers jumped into the water and escaped
properties.reported_to: Indonesian Navy and Marine Police and port authority

properties.incident_details: Three robbers boarded  the ship at anchor via the poop deck. Alert deck crew spotted the robbers and notified the duty officer who raised the alarm. The robbers escaped
The ship was boarded by robbers who stole ship’s stores and escaped unnoticed. Port control was informed.
properties.consequences_for_crew_etc: Ship’s stores stolen

properties.incident_details: Alert duty crew on board the anchored ship noticed robbers attempting to board the ship via the anchor chain. Alarm raised and crew mustered. The robbers aborted the attempt and escaped in an unlit boat.
properties.action_taken_by_master_crew: Raised the alarm and crew mustered

properties.incident_details: Three robbers in a boat boarded the anchored ship at the forecastle. Alert duty crew spotted the robbers and raised the alarm, resulting in the robbers escaping empty-handed.
properties.consequences_for_crew_etc: All crew were safe
properties.action_taken_by_master_crew: Alert duty crew spotted the robbers and raised the alarm

properties.incident_details: Robbers boarded the ship via anchor chain.  They broke into forward store and stole ship's stores.  Port control informed
properties.consequences_for_crew_etc: Ship's stores stolen
properties.reported_to: Port Control, Indonesian Navy Headquarters, SAR, Jakarta and Indonesian Marine Police Headquarters

properties.incident_details: Robbers boarded the ship at anchor. The robbers stole ship's stores and escaped
properties.consequences_for_crew_etc: Ship's stores stolen
properties.action_taken_by_master_crew: Crew carried out inspection and increased frequency of patrols/rounds

properties.incident_details: Engine room stores were robbed from a LPG tanker carrying out STS transfer operations. The robbery was discovered on sailing.
properties.consequences_for_crew_etc: Ship's stores were stolen

properties.incident_details: Pirates boarded the tanker underway and stole crew's personal belongings and cash and escaped. No injuries to crew and the tanker continued its passage.
properties.consequences_for_crew_etc: Crew's cash and personal effects were stolen

properties.incident_details: Five robbers in a boat attempted to board the ship from the starboard quarter by using a grappling hook.  The duty A/B spotted them and informed the OOW who raised alarm, sounded ship's whistle and alerted crew members.  The robbers aborted attempt and moved away.  Nothing was stolen
properties.reported_to: SAR Jakarta, Indonesian Navy Headquarters and Marine Police Headquarters

properties.incident_details: Duty QM onboard the ship at anchor noticed two robbers hiding under windlass.  D/O informed and crew mustered.  Robbers jumped overboard and escaped in a waiting boat.  Nothing was stolen but it appeared that the robbers had tried to steal the emergency towing wire
properties.reported_to: PRC, Indonesian Navy HQ, Marine Police HQ, Bakorkamla & SAR Jakarta

properties.incident_details: Robbers boarded the ship at anchor.  They managed to break into the forepeak and stole ship’s stores
properties.consequences_for_crew_etc: Ship’s stores stolen

properties.incident_details: Duty officer spotted a speedboat on radar trailing it at distance of 2 nm. Master enforced anti-piracy measures, took evasive manoeuvres and sent warning to ships in the area by VHF Ch.16.  Pirates abandoned attempted boarding
properties.action_taken_by_master_crew: Master raised alarm, increased speed and took evasive manoeuvres

properties.incident_details: Six pirates armed with knives and guns boarded the ship en route from Singapore to Vietnam. They entered the bridge and tied up the Master and second officer. They stole Master's and crew's personal belongings and escaped in a speedboat
properties.consequences_for_crew_etc: Master's and crew's personal belongings stolen
properties.action_taken_by_master_crew: Turned on deck lights and raised alarm

properties.incident_details: About six robbers armed with long knives boarded the ship at anchor. The robbers took hostage the duty watchman and tied him up. The robbers stole ship's stores and property and escaped
properties.consequences_for_crew_etc: Ship's stores and property stolen
properties.reported_to: Port and harbour authorities and PFSO

properties.incident_details: Robbers boarded an anchored tanker, stole ship's stores and escaped unnoticed.
properties.consequences_for_crew_etc: Ship’s stores stolen

properties.incident_details: Robbers boarded the anchored ship unnoticed. They stole the ship’s stores and escaped.
properties.consequences_for_crew_etc: Robbers stole the ship’s stores

properties.incident_details: An unknown number of pirates from a fast moving fishing boat boarded a barge being towed by a tug. They forced open and stole goods from the containers on the barge and escaped.
properties.consequences_for_crew_etc: Goods from containers stolen

properties.incident_details: Deck watch keepers on board the ship noticed three to five robbers with long knives near the forecastle store. They raised the alarm and retreated to the accommodation. On hearing the alarm, the robbers escaped in their waiting boat. On investigation it was discovered that ship's stores had been stolen.
properties.consequences_for_crew_etc: Robbers boarded the ship and stole ship's stores
properties.action_taken_by_master_crew: Raised the alarm and crew mustered

properties.incident_details: Six robbers armed with knives boarded the ship underway. They stole ship's cash and crew personal belongings and escaped. No injuries to crew
properties.consequences_for_crew_etc: Robbers stole ship’s cash and crew personal belongings
properties.action_taken_by_master_crew: Master sent distress message and SSAS activated

properties.incident_details: Four robbers boarded the ship from poop deck. They were spotted by the duty watchman who informed the bridge duty officer. Alarm raised and crew mustered.  On seeing crew alertness the robbers escaped in a boat

The ship, at anchor, waiting to berth, maintained an anti piracy watch on the forecastle, main deck and poop deck.  The A/Bs on the main deck and poop heard the A/B on the forecastle shouting.  They alerted the bridge on radio.  The D/O tried to contact him but there was no response.  An alarm was raised and the crew alerted.  A thorough search was carried out for the A/B but he was missing.  Local authorities were informed
properties.consequences_for_crew_etc: Crew member missing
properties.reported_to: Pilot Station, Bakorkamla, Indonesian Navy Headquarters, Marine Police Headquarters and SAR Jakarta
properties.coastal_state_action_taken: Police are investigating the incident

properties.incident_details: Three robbers armed with knives boarded the ship at anchor via the stern. Alert watchman notified duty officer who raised ship’s alarm and whistle. Robbers immediately jumped overboard and escaped.  The incident was reported to Tg. Priok port control, but there was no response
properties.action_taken_by_master_crew: D/O raised alarm and sounded ship’s whistle
properties.reported_to: Port Control, PRC relayed message to Bakorkamla, Indonesian Navy HQ, Puskodal, Marine Police HQ & SAR Jakarta

properties.incident_details: Two speed boats approached the ship underway from the starboard and port side. Crew raised alarm and directed the search lights towards the boats. Mater sounded the ship’s whistle and took evasive manoeuvres. Later pirates abandoned attack
properties.action_taken_by_master_crew: Raised alarm, directed search lights at the boat, sounded ship’s whistle and took evasive manoeuvres

properties.incident_details: Robbers boarded the ship at anchor. Alarm for forecastle watertight door was activated. Robbers broke forecastle store door. Ship’s stores and property stolen
properties.consequences_for_crew_etc: Ship’s stores and property stolen

properties.incident_details: Eight robbers armed with knives boarded the tugboat underway. The robbers escaped empty handed
Robbers boarded the tanker at anchor. Robbers stole ship's stores and escaped unnoticed. Master reported incident to port authority.
properties.consequences_for_crew_etc: Ship's stores were stolen
properties.action_taken_by_master_crew: All crew mustered and master conducted thorough search

properties.incident_details: The duty A/B noticed one robber at starboard hawse pipe, trying to break open the lock. One boat was noticed nearby with two more persons onboard. Alarm raised, crew mustered. The robber jumped into the water and escaped in the waiting boat. Nothing stolen.
properties.action_taken_by_master_crew: The master raised the alarm and crew mustered
properties.coastal_state_action_taken: n/a

properties.incident_details: Two robbers attempted to board the anchored tanker from port quarter. The alert crew noticed the robbers and raised the alarm. On hearing the alarm, the robbers aborted the boarding and escaped. Authorities were informed via local agents.
properties.consequences_for_crew_etc: Nil
properties.action_taken_by_master_crew: The master raised the alarm and the crew mustered

properties.incident_details: Four robbers boarded the berthed ship during discharge operations. They broke into the deck store, stole the ship's stores and escaped unnoticed. The theft was noticed during the hand-over watch and was reported to the local agent and the port authorities.
properties.consequences_for_crew_etc: Robbers stole the ship’s stores
properties.action_taken_by_master_crew: Raised the alarm and the crew mustered

properties.incident_details: Robbers boarded the ship and were noticed by the alert duty crew who informed the OOW.  The alarm was raised and the crew were alerted. Seeing the alert crew, the robbers jumped overboard and escaped.

While at berth, an unknown number of robbers armed with knives boarded the ship. The duty crew noticed them stealing ship's property from the poop deck store. The robbers escaped after the crew were alerted and the alarm sounded.
properties.consequences_for_crew_etc: No crew reported injured. Ship's equipment stolen

properties.incident_details: Four robbers armed with long knives in a speedboat boarded the ship from stern.  They entered accommodation and held a crew member at knife point.  They tied up the C/O and stole his valuables and property from other cabins.  They then entered the Master's cabin and searched for valuables/cash but could not find any.  Later, they escaped in their boat
properties.consequences_for_crew_etc: Crew members assaulted and personal belongings stolen
properties.reported_to: SAR, Jakarta and Indonesian Navy Headquarters and Marine Police Headquarters

properties.incident_details: Five robbers in a dark grey unlit speedboat tried to board the ship.  Alert crew mustered and directed searchlights at the boat and boarding was averted
properties.reported_to: SAR, Jakarta and Indonesian Navy Headquarters and Marine Police Headquarters

properties.incident_details: Seven robbers in a speedboat approached the ship and attempted to board from stern, while underway.  Alert crew mustered and activated fire hoses and boarding was averted
properties.action_taken_by_master_crew: Raised alarm, mustered crew and activated fire hoses
properties.reported_to: SAR, Jakarta, Indonesian Navy Headquarters and Marine Police Headquarters

properties.incident_details: Six robbers armed with long knives in a speedboat boarded the ship, while underway.  They held Master, Chief Engineer and two other engineers hostage.  They stole equipment and personal belongings of crew and escaped
properties.consequences_for_crew_etc: Four crew members held hostage; equipment and crew's personal belongings stolen
properties.reported_to: SAR, Jakarta, Navy Headquarters and Marine Police Headquarters

properties.incident_details: Three robbers armed with long knives in a 5m long green/brown motorised banka threw grapnel hooks at the stern of the ship attempting to board, while underway.  Alert crew mustered and the robbers aborted boarding
properties.reported_to: SAR, Jakarta, Navy Headquarters and Marine Police Headquarters

properties.incident_details: Robbers in several unlit boats followed the ship, while underway and came close to her stern.  Crew mustered, switched on deck lights and activated fire hoses.  The boats aborted chase and moved away
properties.reported_to: SAR, Jakarta, Indonesian Marine Police Headquarters and Indonesian Navy Headquarters

properties.incident_details: Five robbers in a 5-metre green-coloured boat attempted to board the ship using grappling hooks.  Alert crew prevented boarding
properties.reported_to: SAR, Jakarta, Indonesian Navy and Marine Police

properties.incident_details: Ten robbers armed with guns and long knives boarded the ship, while underway.  They stole Master and crew's cash and escaped in their boat
properties.consequences_for_crew_etc: Master and crew's cash stolen
properties.reported_to: SAR, Jakarta, Indonesian Navy Headquarters and Puskodal

properties.incident_details: Five robbers armed with long knives boarded the ship, while at anchor.  They tied up two crew members and threatened them with knives.  They stole engine spares and escaped in a speedboat
properties.consequences_for_crew_etc: Crew members assaulted and engine spares stolen
properties.reported_to: SAR, Jakarta, Indonesian Navy and Marine Police

properties.incident_details: Six robbers armed with long knives in an unlit boat approached the ship from stern, while at anchor.  Two robbers boarded and broke open padlock on engine room.  They stole engine spares and escaped
properties.consequences_for_crew_etc: Engine spares stolen
properties.reported_to: SAR, Jakarta, Indonesian Navy & Marine Police

properties.incident_details: Three robbers armed with long knives boarded the ship, while at anchor.  They entered the engine room and stole a substantial quantity of engine spares
properties.consequences_for_crew_etc: Engine spares stolen
properties.reported_to: Puskodal, Marine Police Headquarters & SAR, Jakarta

properties.incident_details: Six boats (2 boats - white hull, 4 boats - black hull) approached the ship from stern.  Each boat had five masked pirates dressed in black clothes.  The boats came close to stern and alert crew mustered and ship altered course.  Boats aborted attempt and moved away
properties.action_taken_by_master_crew: Raised alarm, mustered crew and ship altered course
properties.reported_to: SAR, Jakarta, Indonesian Navy Headquarters, PUSKODAL and RCC Australia

properties.incident_details: Six pirates armed with pistols approached the tug towing a barge.  Four of the pirates boarded and assaulted crew causing injuries.  They stole crew's belongings and ship's equipment and escaped in a speedboat
properties.consequences_for_crew_etc: Crew injured and crew's belongings and ship's equipment stolen
properties.reported_to: MPA, Singapore, SAR, Jakarta & Indonesian Navy Headquarters

properties.incident_details: Eight robbers armed with knives boarded the ship, while at anchor.  They entered the engine room, tied up and assaulted two duty crew members.  The robbers stole generator spares and escaped
properties.consequences_for_crew_etc: Crew members assaulted and generator spares stolen
properties.reported_to: SAR, Jakarta, Marine Police and Indonesian Navy Headquarters

properties.incident_details: Four robbers boarded the ship, while at anchor and entered the engine room via funnel by cutting the grills on the funnel floor.  They stole engine spares and escaped in a boat waiting with an accomplice
properties.consequences_for_crew_etc: Engine spares stolen
properties.reported_to: SAR, Jakarta, Marine Police, Indonesian Navy Headquarters & PUSKODAL

properties.incident_details: Two robbers armed with large knives boarded the ship at berth.  They assaulted Master and escaped with a large amount of cash.  Master sustained serious injuries and needed hospital treatment
properties.consequences_for_crew_etc: Master seriously injured and cash stolen
properties.reported_to: SAR, Jakarta, Indonesian Navy Headquarters and Marine Police

properties.incident_details: Four robbers in a motorboat approached the ship at port quarter, during cargo operations and three robbers boarded, while at anchor.  The D/O raised alarm, mustered crew and the robbers jumped overboard and escaped empty handed
properties.reported_to: SAR, Jakarta, Navy Headquarters and Marine Police, Indonesia

properties.incident_details: Three robbers armed with long swords boarded the ship at anchor and attempted to break into the accommodation area. Duty crew raised alarm and informed the Master. The robbers escaped
Three armed robbers boarded the ship at poop deck, while at anchor.  Alert duty watchman raised alarm and the robbers escaped empty handed
properties.reported_to: SAR, Jakarta, Navy Headquarters and Marine Police Headquarters, Indonesia

properties.incident_details: Four robbers in an unlit mechanised dinghy approached the ship, while at anchor, during cargo operations.  One robber boarded and gained access to forecastle deck while the other three were in the process of boarding.  Alert crew raised alarm, mustered crew and the robbers escaped empty handed.  No response from port control
properties.reported_to: PUSKODAL, Navy Headquarters and Marine Police Headquarters, Indonesia and SAR, Jakarta
properties.coastal_state_action_taken: No response from Port Control

properties.incident_details: Three boats approached the ship at the stern, while at anchor.  Robbers from two of the boats boarded and entered the engine room.  Crew raised alarm but the robbers managed to escape with stolen engine spares
properties.consequences_for_crew_etc: Engine spares stolen
properties.reported_to: SAR, Jakarta, Marine Police Headquarters and Navy Headquarters, Indonesia

properties.incident_details: Robbers boarded the ship at anchor. Anti-piracy crew discovered ship’s stores stolen
properties.consequences_for_crew_etc: Ship’s stores stolen

properties.incident_details: Whilst crew were busy discharging operations, robbers armed with steel bars broke into two compartments and stole ship's stores.  On noticing the suspicious behaviour of shoreworkers on deck, the duty crew informed the D/O who raised alarm and mustered crew.  It was suspected that the stevedores/shoreworkers may have been involved in the theft.  Local authorities were informed
properties.consequences_for_crew_etc: Ship's stores stolen
properties.reported_to: Local police, SAR Jakarta, Marine Police Headquarters and Navy Headquarters, Indonesia

properties.incident_details: Six robbers armed with knives boarded the ship, while at anchor.  They attempted to overpower the shore watchman who raised alarm.  The D/O and crew rushed to assist and when confronted by crew, the robbers jumped overboard and escaped empty handed
properties.reported_to: Coast Guard, Police, SAR Jakarta, Marine Police Headquarters and Navy Headquarters, Indonesia

properties.incident_details: Robbers boarded the ship, while at anchor, forced open the forecastle store and stole ship's stores
properties.consequences_for_crew_etc: Ship's stores stolen
properties.reported_to: SAR, Marine Police and Naval Headquarters

properties.incident_details: Robbers boarded the ship and broke padlocks of STBD side chemical equipment locker and paint room door.  The security watchman at forward reported to the D/O who raised alarm, sounded ship's whistle, activated fire pump with pressurized water jets, closed all access to bridge and accommodation and gathered all crew at bridge.  The robbers jumped overboard and escaped in a waiting boat.  No injuries to crew
properties.reported_to: Port Control, Indonesian Navy HQ, Marine Police HQ, PUSKODAL and SAR, Jakarta

properties.incident_details: Three robbers gained access to the ship from the outboard side of the ship via a motorboat.  The robbers held the 3rd Engineer and stole parts from the engine room.  They were detected by the AB on watch.  The general alarm was raised
properties.consequences_for_crew_etc: One crew member held and ship's stores stolen
properties.coastal_state_action_taken: Unknown

properties.incident_details: Two robbers armed with steel bars boarded the ship and entered into engine room.  They stole generator spares and escaped through engine room door leading to poop deck.  Master raised alarm and made an announcement over the public address system.  The crew conducted a search of the ship.  Local police informed.
properties.consequences_for_crew_etc: Generator spares stolen
properties.reported_to: Local Police, Indonesian Navy Headquarters, SAR, Jakarta and Indonesian Marine Police Headquarters

properties.incident_details: The D/O noticed a robber onboard and another attempting to board, while at anchor.  He raised alarm, alerted crew and the robbers jumped overboard and escaped
properties.reported_to: SAR, Jakarta, Indonesian Navy Headquarters and Indonesian Marine Police Headquarters

properties.incident_details: Robbers boarded the ship via a small boat, while at anchor and stole one of its life rafts.  Local police and port security were informed via the local agent
properties.consequences_for_crew_etc: Life raft stolen
properties.reported_to: Local Police, Port Security, SAR Jakarta, Indonesian Navy Headquarters and Indonesian Marine Police Headquarters

properties.incident_details: Armed robbers boarded the ship at anchor from the stern.  They broke open locked steering room door and entered the engine room via watertight manhole.  They stole engine spares and escaped
properties.consequences_for_crew_etc: Engine spares stolen
properties.reported_to: SAR, Jakarta, Indonesian Navy Headquarters and Indonesian Marine Police Headquarters

properties.incident_details: Six robbers armed with long knives boarded the ship underway from a small high-speed fishing boat. The robbers escaped after taking some cash
properties.consequences_for_crew_etc: Ship's cas was stolen
properties.action_taken_by_master_crew: rEported the incident to Singapore’s Port Operation and control Centre

properties.incident_details: Four robbers armed with knives boarded the tanker discharging at an SBM. They entered the engine room. They were noticed by the duty oiler who informed the duty officer. Alarm was raised and crew alerted. The robbers escaped empty handed. Crew mustered and searched was carried out
properties.action_taken_by_master_crew: Alarm was raised and crew alerted
properties.reported_to: Yes, PRC relayed message to SAR Jakarta, Indonesian Navy HQ & Marine Police

properties.incident_details: Robbers armed with knives in an unlit boat approached the ship at anchor and threw a line onboard at the port quarter.  On seeing the alert crew, the robbers aborted the attempt
properties.reported_to: SAR Jakarta, Indonesian Navy Headquarters and Marine Police Headquarters

properties.incident_details: Ten armed pirates intercepted and boarded the ship from two grey-coloured fibre-glass speedboats with outboard engines.  The crew activated the AIS alert system and broadcast a distress message.  The crew was tied up at gunpoint and blindfolded.  The pirates took control of the ship and the master was ordered to turn the ship North East towards Malapas Island.  After steaming for 45 minutes, the ship's engines stalled 40NM from Horsburgh lighthouse.  When the pirates could not restart the engines, they abandoned the ship and escaped in the speedboats.  The crew managed to free themselves.  VTIS was informed and the ship made its way to Singapore.  There were no injuries to crew and all cargo intact but  they stole crew's personal effects, ship's property and smashed all communication equipment
properties.consequences_for_crew_etc: Crew members assaulted, communication equipment damaged, crew's personal effects and ship's property stolen
properties.reported_to: VTIS Singapore, SAR Jakarta, Indonesian Navy Headquarters, PUSKODAL and Marine Police Headquarters

properties.incident_details: Three robbers armed with knives boarded the ship from port quarter.  They entered accommodation.  Master raised alarm, alerted crew and informed authorities.  A search party conducted a thorough search onboard and found nothing missing
properties.reported_to: Harbour Master, Indonesian Navy Headquarters, Marine Police Headquarters and SAR Jakarta

properties.incident_details: Two robbers boarded the ship, while at anchor and entered the engine room via the open sky light.  The crew in the engine room tried to apprehend them but were threatened with long knives.  Engine room crew informed the bridge and the alarm was raised and crew mustered.  The robbers also threatened the deck watch and escaped with some engine spares by jumping overboard.  Investigation revealed that the robbers may have boarded the ship when a crew member had gone into accommodation to wake up the next watch and the other crew member went for a security round on deck.  There were no injuries to crew
properties.consequences_for_crew_etc: Crew members threatened and engine spares stolen
properties.reported_to: SAR Jakarta, Indonesian Navy Headquarters and Indonesian Marine Police

properties.incident_details: Robbers armed with guns in ten speedboats fired shots and attempted to board the ship, while at anchor.  The ship owners contacted the IMB Piracy Reporting Centre (PRC) and asked for assistance.  Meanwhile, the master took evasive manoeuvres, heaved anchor and proceeded to sea.  Later, master informed that three police personnel had boarded the ship.  There were no injuries
properties.reported_to: Port Control, SAR Jakarta, Indonesian Navy Headquarters, Puskodal and Guskamlabar
properties.coastal_state_action_taken: Three police personnel boarded the ship

properties.incident_details: Duty watch detected three robbers on the forecastle deck and warned the OOW.  The Master raised a general alarm and the 2nd Officer started the fire pump.  The Master tried to contact the local Port Control and Pilot Station on VHF Ch. 16/12 but without success.  Sound signal by whistle was given.  Search by crew team indicated that the robbers had escaped
properties.consequences_for_crew_etc: A mooring rope was found about 5-6 metres unwound from winch on deck and connected with heaving line - prepared for discharging through starboard side hawse.  Old/damaged carcher machine was found missing.  Securing rope was cut
properties.action_taken_by_master_crew: Raised alarm and the Master took preventive measures which resulted in the pirates escaping
properties.coastal_state_action_taken: No response from Belawan Port Control and Pilot Station

properties.incident_details: Robbers boarded the ship while at berth.  The ship was in her final stages of cargo operations and crew and officers were busy.  The robbers stole ship's stores and escaped unnoticed
properties.consequences_for_crew_etc: Ship's stores stolen
properties.reported_to: SAR Jakarta, Indonesian Navy Headquarters and Marine Police Headquarters

properties.incident_details: Three robbers armed with long knives boarded the ship at berth, via the forecastle, while waiting for pilot to board.  The D/O noticed the robbers and raised the alarm, sounded the ship's whistle and alerted the crew.  The robbers jumped overboard and escaped in a speedboat.  There were no injuries to crew and nothing was stolen
properties.reported_to: SAR Jakarta, Indonesian Navy Headquarters and Marine Police Headquarters

properties.incident_details: Four robbers armed with sticks boarded the ship at anchor.  They broke into the forward locker and tried to steal ship's stores.  Duty crew raised an alarm and sounded ship's whistle.  Crew mustered and activated fire hoses.  Robbers jumped overboard with a life raft and escaped in a waiting boat
properties.consequences_for_crew_etc: Ship's property stolen
properties.action_taken_by_master_crew: Raised alarm and sounded ship's whistle.  Crew mustered and activated fire hoses
properties.reported_to: Port Authority, Bakorkamla, Indonesian Navy Headquarters, Puskodal and SAR Jakarta

properties.incident_details: Five robbers armed with knives and crowbars boarded the ship via the anchor chain, using hooks.  They broke the padlock to the paint locker and stole six drums of paint.  The duty A/B alerted the OOW who raised alarm and sounded the ship's whistle.  Crew mustered and the robbers jumped overboard and escaped in a speedboat.  The timely action of the crew prevented the robbers from stealing a mooring rope.  There were no injuries to crew
properties.consequences_for_crew_etc: Paint stolen
properties.reported_to: SAR Jakarta, Indonesian Navy Headquarters and Marine Police Headquarters

properties.incident_details: Four pirates in a speedboat approached the yacht underway.  When the boat was nearly alongside, a pirate standing on the bow attempted to throw a small warp-anchor with a thin rope attached to enable boarding.  The Master increased speed and manoeuvred the yacht in a zigzag manner.  Luckily, the boat's engine failed enabling the yacht to escape
properties.action_taken_by_master_crew: Raised alarm, incresed speed and manoeuvred the yacht in a zigzag manner
properties.reported_to: Bakorkamla, Indonesian Navy Headquarters, Puskodal and SAR Jakarta

properties.incident_details: The duty crew on the ship noticed two robbers on the forecastle deck, while at anchor.  The D/O on bridge was alerted and the alarm raised.  The robbers jumped overboard and escaped in a speedboat when they saw the crew approaching.  Upon inspection, it was found that the forward life raft had been stolen.  The authorities and the agents were informed
properties.consequences_for_crew_etc: Forward life raft stolen
properties.reported_to: Local authorities, BAKORKAMLA and SAR, Jakarta

properties.incident_details: A few fishing boats diverted the attention of the watchkeepers while two robbers boarded the tanker at anchor, using grappling hooks.  The robbers stole two life rafts and escaped.  Port authorities were informed, however, no action was taken
properties.consequences_for_crew_etc: Life rafts stolen
properties.reported_to: Port authorities, BAKORKAMLA and SAR, Jakarta

properties.incident_details: The duty watchman sighted two robbers climbing up the anchor chain and three other accomplices in a boat close to the anchor cable.  The watchman notified the D/O who raised the alarm.  The robbers abandoned their attempt to board and escaped in the waiting boat
properties.reported_to: BAKORKAMLA, Indonesian Navy Headquarters, PUSKODAL and SAR, Jakarta

properties.incident_details: Six pirates armed with knives boarded the ship and stole ship’s cash and crew's personal belongings
properties.consequences_for_crew_etc: Four crew members were taken hostage. Ship’s cash and crew's personal belongings were stolen

properties.incident_details: Five robbers on a boat boarded the ship at anchor. Master immediately reported to the local authorities via VHF and mustered all crew on bridge. Local authorities managed to arrive on time and detain the robbers
properties.consequences_for_crew_etc: Ship’s stores stolen

properties.incident_details: About eleven robbers, armed with long knives and shotguns boarded the ship underway.  On sighting the robbers, crew members ran inside the accommodation and closed all doors.  On taking a headcount, master realised that one oiler was being held hostage.  Master contacted the shore authorities.  The robbers opened fire but there were no injuries to the crew.  The robbers escaped in a small speedboat.  Coast Guard arrived to investigate.  No stores missing
properties.consequences_for_crew_etc: Crew member held hostage
properties.reported_to: Port Control, BAKORKAMLA, Indonesian Navy Headquarters, PUSKODAL and SAR Jakarta
properties.coastal_state_action_taken: Coast Guard boarded to investigate

properties.incident_details: The duty watchman onboard the ship at anchor, noticed robbers trying to open the watertight door to the forecastle store. He immediately alerted the OOW who, in turn, raised the alarm and crew mustered. On seeing crew alertness, the robbers jumped overboard and escaped empty handed in a waiting boat with one accomplice
properties.action_taken_by_master_crew: OOW raised alarm and crew mustered
properties.reported_to: Bakorkamla, Indonesian Navy HQ, Puskodal, Indonesian Marine Police HQ & SAR Jakarta

properties.incident_details: Six armed robbers, from two boats, boarded the anchored ship, from the port and starboard quarters.  The duty AB was attacked and hit on the head with an axe, causing severe bleeding.  The ship's alarm was raised and crew mustered.  The robbers stole engine spares and escaped.  Pilot and local agents were informed.  The injured crew were taken ashore, by pilot boat, for medical treatment and then repatriated
properties.consequences_for_crew_etc: Duty AB injured and engine spares stolen
properties.reported_to: Port Control, BAKORKAMLA Indonesia, PUSKODAL, Indonesian Navy Headquarters and SAR Jakarta

properties.incident_details: Duty crew spotted a robber on the forecastle deck, at anchor.  The OOW was informed and an alarm raised.  The robbber jumped overboard and escaped in an unlit boat.  Later, ship's stores were found missing
properties.consequences_for_crew_etc: Ship's stores stolen
properties.reported_to: United Kingdom, Bakorkamla, Indonesian Navy Headquarters, PUSKODAL and SAR Jakarta

properties.incident_details: Robbers boarded the ship unnoticed, at berth.  The 3rd Engineer noticed the boat store was not locked, moreover some electrical spares were missing.  The crew were alerted and a thorough inspection was carried out.  All doors/stores were found to be secured.  It was suspected that the robbers could have boarded via the stern mooring rope.  One shore security guard was constantly on duty
properties.consequences_for_crew_etc: Spare parts stolen
properties.reported_to: United Kingdom, Bakorkamla, SAR Jakarta, Indonesian Navy Headquarters and Marine Police Headquarters

properties.incident_details: Seven robbers armed with guns, knives, crowbars and steel pipes boarded the ship at anchor.  They held the duty A/B at gunpoint and tied him up.  They tried to break open the bosun store door but were unsuccessful.  The robbers stole the duty A/B's walkie-talkie and ship's stores and escaped
properties.consequences_for_crew_etc: Robbers held the duty A/B at gunpoint and tied him up.  They stole a walkie-talkie and ship's stores
properties.reported_to: Bakorkamla, Indonesian Navy Headquarters, Puskodal and SAR Jakarta

properties.incident_details: Robbers boarded the ship, at anchor and held one A/B hostage.  They stole ship's stores and escaped.  The A/B was released unharmed.  Local authorities were informed
properties.consequences_for_crew_etc: Crew member held hostage and ship's stores stolen
properties.reported_to: Port authorities, Bakorkamla, Indonesian Navy Headquarters and SAR Jakarta

properties.incident_details: Eight robbers armed with knives boarded the ship.  They held three duty crew and tied them up.  The robbers broke open the engine store and stole spares.  D/O raised alarm and crew mustered.  Upon hearing the alarm, the robbers jumped overboard and escaped in an unlit boat
properties.consequences_for_crew_etc: Three crew members held hostage and ship's property stolen
properties.reported_to: Bakorkamla, Indonesian Navy Headquarters, Indonesian Marine Police and SAR Jakarta

properties.incident_details: Three white coloured speedboats, doing 17 kts, approached the ship underway, from the port and starboard side.  The D/O raised alarm, sounded the ship's whistle and crew mustered.  Seeing the crew, the robbers aborted the attempt
properties.action_taken_by_master_crew: Raised alarm, sounded ship's whistle and mustered crew
properties.reported_to: SAR Jakarta, Bakorkamla, Puskodal and Indonesian Navy Headquarters

properties.incident_details: While the deck watchmen were distracted by close passage of a fishing boat and the forecastle post was unmanned for approx. 20 minutes, about six robbers armed with knives boarded the ship using a rope with hook from an unlit boat.  The robbers escaped after the returning duty OS raised the general alarm

About four robbers boarded the anchored ship, via the anchor cable. On seeing the robbers, master raised the alarm.  Seeing alert crew, the robbers jumped overboard and escaped in an unlit boat.  Port Authority informed
properties.action_taken_by_master_crew: Master raised alarm and crew mustered
properties.reported_to: Port Control, Bakorkamla, Indonesian Navy HQ, Puskodal, SAR Basarnas & Indonesian Marine Police HQ

properties.incident_details: Twelve pirates, in a speedboat, armed with guns, swords and iron bars approached the ship underway.  Master raised alarm, crew directed fire hoses and SSAS activated.  Pirates boarded the ship and stole crew personal belongings, ship’s cash and property.  After 50 minutes, they left the ship.  No injuries to crew except minor bruises.  Ships in vicinity alerted
properties.consequences_for_crew_etc: Crew personal belongings, ship’s cash and property were stolen
properties.action_taken_by_master_crew: Master raised alarm, crew directed fire hoses, ships in vicinity alerted and SSAS activated

properties.incident_details: Two robbers boarded the ship while at anchor.  They broke the store lock and stole ship's property.  Alert crew raised alarm and two crew members confronted the robbers who jumped overboard.  However, they could not board their boat which was adrift.  One robber was rescued, the other was not recovered despite a search by the authorities.  The authorities boarded the ship for investigation and the master handed over the robber.  No injuries to crew and nothing stolen
properties.action_taken_by_master_crew: Raised alarm and crew confronted the robbers
properties.reported_to: Indonesian Navy and Police, Bakorkamla, Marine Police, Navy Headquarters and SAR Jakarta
properties.coastal_state_action_taken: Authorities boarded the ship for investigation and arrested the robbers

properties.incident_details: Pirates in a small speedboat approached the ship underway.  The master altered course to avoid the boat, however, the boat continued to approach the ship.  Alarm raised, ship whistle sounded and crew mustered.  Seeing alert crew, the boat aborted the attempt and moved away.  Singapore Port Control informed
properties.action_taken_by_master_crew: Raised alarm, mustered crew and altered course
properties.reported_to: Singapore Port Control, BAKORKAMLA, Indonesian Navy Headquarters, Puskodal & SAR Jakarta

properties.incident_details: The master on board the SM V discovered that the workboat Anchor 2 was missing.  It was located the following day.  The towing rope was reportedly missing and the right side glass window, the doors leading to the steering console and the navigational control were broken.  It was reported that robbers had boarded the unmanned Anchor 2 while it was towed by the SM V, cut off the towing rope and set the workboat adrift.  The incident was reported to the coastal state and the flag state
properties.consequences_for_crew_etc: Workboat hijacked; the window and doors leading to the navigational control broken

properties.incident_details: A crewmember spotted several robbers on the forecastle when he was sent forward to look for the duty O/S who was not responding to calls on the radio.  The robbers had caught and tied up the duty O/S.  Alarm raised and crew alerted.  On hearing the alarm, the robbers escaped.  A search revealed that the robbers had attempted to enter the forecastle store
properties.consequences_for_crew_etc: Robbers caught and tied up the duty O/S
properties.reported_to: Belawan Port Control, BAKORKAMLA, Indonesian Navy Headquarters, Marine Police Headquarters and SAR Jakarta

properties.incident_details: The duty oiler onboard the ship underway noticed a pirate armed with a gun at poop deck.  Duty officer informed.  The alarm was raised, all crew mustered and all lights switched on.  A search of the ship revealed no pirates onboard.  Duty officer noticed an unlit craft moving away from the ship
properties.reported_to: Coast Guard, Bakorkamla Indonesian Navy HQ, Marine Police HQ & SAR Jakarta

properties.incident_details: Duty crew on board the ship noticed robbers on the poop deck.  As he alerted other crew, the robbers who had hidden behind the winches attacked him with iron pipes.  Realising that all crew had been alerted, the robbers jumped overboard and escaped empty handed
properties.consequences_for_crew_etc: Crew member sustained bruises on his back and abrasions on his shoulder
properties.reported_to: Indonesian Navy HQ, Indonesian Marine Police HQ, SAR Jakarta and Bakorkamla

properties.incident_details: Robbers attempted to board the ship on four different occasions. Finally they succeeded in boarding it.  Robbers stole ship’s spares and escaped.  Port authorities were informed and came onboard to investigate
properties.consequences_for_crew_etc: Ship’s spares stolen
properties.reported_to: Port Control, Bakorkamla, Indonesian Navy HQ, SAR Basarnas & Indonesian Marine Police HQ
properties.coastal_state_action_taken: Authorities boarded for investigation

properties.incident_details: Six pirates armed with long knives boarded the ship underway. They entered the bridge, took hostage the duty officer and the AB and tied them up. Later they took the AB to the Master’s cabin and stole cash and personal property and escaped
properties.consequences_for_crew_etc: Crew's cash and personal property stolen

properties.incident_details: Two robbers in a small boat attempted to board the tanker at anchor. Alert crew raised alarm, whistle sounded and crew mustered.  The robbers aborted the attempt and escaped
properties.action_taken_by_master_crew: Alert crew raised alarm, whistle sounded and crew mustered

properties.incident_details: Pirates boarded the barge under tow and stole barge equipment and property
properties.consequences_for_crew_etc: Pirates stole ship’s property
properties.reported_to: PRC relayed message to Bakorkamla, Indonesian Navy HQ, Indonesian Marine Police HQ, SAR Jakarta

properties.incident_details: Ships crew noticed robbers on board just after anchoring. The robbers had broken into the safety equipment locker and had stolen ship stores. When challenged the robbers jumped over board and escaped. No injuries to crew
properties.consequences_for_crew_etc: Robbers broke into the safety equipment locker and stole ship stores

properties.incident_details: Robbers armed with knives boarded the ship from a small boat.  Duty crew member spotted them and tried to inform the bridge by walkie-talkie.  The robbers  attacked him with knives and a piece of wood. He received injuries on his arm and back.  However, he managed to inform the bridge, which raised the general alarm.  The robbers jumped overboard and escaped.  Ship’s stores stolen.  Port authorities did not respond to calls on VHF radio
properties.consequences_for_crew_etc: Duty crew assaulted and injured.  Ship’s stores stolen
properties.coastal_state_action_taken: No response from port authorities

properties.incident_details: Pirates armed with long knives in a speed boat boarded the tanker underway. They stole crew personal belongings and ship's property and escaped. No injuries
properties.consequences_for_crew_etc: Crew personal belongings and ship's property were stolen

properties.incident_details: Pirates in military camouflage attempted to board the tanker underway using a bamboo pole attached to a hook. Master raised alarm and alerted ships in vicinity. Pirates aborted the attempt and escaped in their blue hull speed boat
Eight pirates armed with long knives and bars boarded the ship underway. Pirates stole ship’s cash and crew properties and escaped. No injuries to crew.
properties.consequences_for_crew_etc: Ship’s cash and crew properties were stolen
properties.reported_to: PRC relayed message to Bakorkamla, Indonesian Navy HQ, Indonesian Marine Police HQ, SAR Jakarta

properties.incident_details: Pirates in a wooden speedboat armed with long knives and bars boarded the tanker en route to Singapore.  They stole ship’s cash and crew property and escaped.  No injuries to crew
properties.consequences_for_crew_etc: Pirates stole ship’s cash and crew property
properties.reported_to: PRC relayed message to Bakorkamla, Indonesian Navy HQ, Indonesian Marine Police HQ, SAR Jakarta, MRCC Putrajaya & MPA Singapore

properties.incident_details: Pirates in a speedboat chased and opened fire to the ship enroute to Australia. Master took evasive manoeuvres and raised alarm.  Local units were sent to assist and respond accordingly. After two hours of continuous firing and chasing, the pirate boat aborted the attempt.  Master fearing further attack from pirate boat, discontinued passage and returned to last port
properties.consequences_for_crew_etc: Pirates opened fired to the ship. Serious damages to bridge, communication equipment and hull
properties.action_taken_by_master_crew: Master took evasive manoeuvres and informed managers
properties.reported_to: PRC relayed message to Bakorkamla, Indonesian Navy HQ, Indonesian Marine Police HQ, SAR Jakarta
properties.coastal_state_action_taken: Local unites were sent to assist the ship

properties.incident_details: The duty AB onboard the tanker reported three small suspicious boats at a distance of about 250 m on the starboard beam and starboard quarter of the tanker. The boats were blue and each measures about 12 m long, has a wooden hull and fitted with four large sea horse power engines. The four men in the boats were wearing blue oilskins. Master raised the alarm and activated anti-piracy measures.  Other vessels in the vicinity were informed. The boats moved away at 18:20 hrs. and were seen heading towards Bintan island
properties.action_taken_by_master_crew: Master raised the alarm and activated anti-piracy measures

properties.incident_details: While the ship was anchored at Tanjung Priok anchorage, two unarmed robbers were sighted by Motorman boarding the ship from the aft poop deck.  They broke open the steering gear room padlock bracket and entered the dry passageway.  They fled after seeing the Motorman.  The alarm was raised but the robbers had already escaped
properties.action_taken_by_master_crew: All patrols were alerted and general alarm was sounded.  Security level was raised to level 2 and number of patrols during daylight were increased.  Fire pump was kept on and hoses were charged to deter thieves

properties.incident_details: Duty crew onboard the ship saw robbers stealing ship’s equipment.  Alarm raised and crew alerted.  On seeing crew alertness, the robbers escaped into a waiting boat.  Upon investigation, it was discovered ship’s stores and equipment were stolen
properties.consequences_for_crew_etc: Ship’s stores and equipment stolen
properties.reported_to: PRC relayed message to Bakorkamla, Indonesian Navy HQ, Indonesian Marine Police HQ & SAR Jakarta

properties.incident_details: Robbers boarded the ship at anchor by climbing the anchor chain.  They opened the forecastle store and tried to steal ship’s stores.  Duty crew noticed them.  Alarm raised, crew alerted and mustered as per company procedures.  Sensing crew alertness, the robbers jumped overboard and escaped.  No injuries to crew and nothing stolen
properties.reported_to: Port Control and PRC relayed message to Bakorkamla, Indonesia Navy HQ, Puskodal, Indonesian Marine Police HQ & SAR Jakarta

properties.incident_details: Robbers boarded the ship at berth and stole ship’s equipment (spare parts) of considerable value from the spare parts locker.   The incident was unnoticed by ship’s crew
properties.consequences_for_crew_etc: Ship’s equipment stolen
properties.reported_to: PRC relayed message to Bakorkamla, Indonesian Navy HQ, Indonesian Marine Police HQ, Puskodal & SAR Jakarta

properties.incident_details: Several robbers boarded the ship at anchor at the forward mooring station.  Ship raised alarm and the intruders escaped in a waiting boat.  Due to heavy rain, master was unable to confirm the number of robbers and the weapons.  Ship’s stores were stolen
properties.consequences_for_crew_etc: Ship’s stores stolen
properties.reported_to: PRC relayed message to Bakorkamla, Indonesian Navy HQ, Indonesian Marine Police HQ, Puskodal & SAR Jakarta

properties.incident_details: Robbers boarded the ship at anchor, via the forecastle and stole ship's stores.  Alarm raised and crew mustered. Robbers escaped
properties.consequences_for_crew_etc: Ship's stores stolen
properties.reported_to: PRC relayed message to Bakorkamla, Indonesian Navy HQ, Puskodal, Marine Police HQ & SAR Basarnas

properties.incident_details: Five robbers armed with long knives boarded the tug underway.  They entered the bridge, tied the masters’ hands and took him to his cabin. The robbers stole personal belongings of the master and crew and left in a waiting speedboat. No injury to crew
properties.consequences_for_crew_etc: Robbers tied the master’s hands, stole his personal belongings and crew belongings
properties.reported_to: PRC relayed message to Bakorkamla, Indonesian Navy HQ, Puskodal, Indonesian Marine Police HQ & SAR Jakarta

properties.incident_details: Eight pirates armed with long knives boarded the ship underway. Pirates tied up the captaiand stole cash. Then they went to chief engineers’ cabin and stole cash money.  Later they took the captain to aft deck and tied him to the bollard before escaping
properties.consequences_for_crew_etc: Pirates stole cash and personal properties
properties.reported_to: PRC relayed message to Bakorkamla, Indonesian Navy HQ, Puskodal, Indonesian Marine Police HQ & SAR Jakarta

properties.incident_details: Eight pirates armed with guns and knives boarded the tanker underway. Pirates took 2nd mate and a duty A/B hostage and took second mate to captain's cabin. They held a knife to the captain’s throat and stole ship’s cash and escaped. Master was kicked in his chest
properties.consequences_for_crew_etc: Pirates stole ship’s and personal cash and properties. Master was assaulted
properties.reported_to: PRC relayed message to Bakorkamla, Indonesian Navy HQ, Puskodal, Indonesian Marine Police HQ & SAR Jakarta

properties.incident_details: Six pirates armed with long knives boarded the tanker underway. They stole ship’s and crew cash and personal belongings before escaping
properties.consequences_for_crew_etc: Pirates stole ship’s and crew cash and crew personal belongings
properties.reported_to: PRC relayed message to Bakorkamla, Indonesian Navy HQ, Puskodal, Indonesian Marine Police HQ & SAR Jakarta

properties.incident_details: Four robbers armed with catapults, knives and hacksaws boarded the ship at anchor. They threatened the duty crew with catapults and stole ship's stores from forward locker. Alarm raised and ship's whistle sounded. Robbers jumped overboard and escaped in a fast wooden boat
properties.consequences_for_crew_etc: Robbers threatened the duty crew with catapults and knives and stole ship's stores
properties.action_taken_by_master_crew: Alarm raised and ship's whistle sounded
properties.reported_to: PSO/PFSO Banjarmasin and PRC relayed message to Bakorkamla, Indonesian Navy HQ, Puskodal, Indonesian Marine Police HQ & SAR Jakarta

properties.incident_details: Four robbers boarded the tanker at anchor. They tried to enter into the accommodation, but were noticed by the duty crew who raised the alarm. Upon hearing the alarm, the robbers climbed down into their boat and escaped. Master broadcast a security alert message to all ships in the vicinity and tried to call Balongan radio, but received no response
properties.action_taken_by_master_crew: Duty crew raised the alarm and master broadcast a security alert message to all ships in the vicinity
properties.reported_to: PRC relayed message to Bakorkamla, Indonesian Navy HQ, Puskodal Jakarta, Marine Police Jakarta, Marine Police Balongan & SAR Jakarta

properties.incident_details: Two robbers using hook and rope from a small boat attempted to board the tanker at anchor.  While climbing to the ship’s rail the robbers saw ship’s alert watch men.  Robbers jumped back into the waiting boat and moved away.  Nothing was stolen
Eight pirates armed with long knives boarded the ship underway.  They held hostage AB and 2/O on watch.  Pirates stole cash and crew' personal belongings and escaped
properties.consequences_for_crew_etc: AB and 2/O on watch were taken hostage.  Pirates stole cash and crew personal belongings
properties.reported_to: Indonesian Navy, Marine Police, SAR Jakarta

properties.incident_details: Three robbers boarded the ship berthed via poop deck and steering gear room. They tied up and assaulted the A/B. Robbers stole ship’s property and escaped
properties.consequences_for_crew_etc: A/B was assaulted. Ship's store stolen

properties.incident_details: Five pirates armed with long knives boarded the ship underway. They stole crews' cash and personal belongings and escaped
properties.consequences_for_crew_etc: Robbers stole crews' cash and personal belongings
properties.reported_to: Bakorkamla, Indonesian Navy HQ, Indonesian Marine Police HQ & SAR Jakarta and MRCC Putrajaya

properties.incident_details: Robbers boarded the ship via the anchor chain while at anchor and through the hawse pipe which had been secured by the crew. They stole ship’s property and escaped unnoticed
properties.consequences_for_crew_etc: Ship’s property stolen

properties.incident_details: Four robbers armed with knives boarded the bulk carrier from a boat while at berth.  Master raised the alarm and mustered the crew.  One padlock was damaged.  Nothing was stolen
properties.action_taken_by_master_crew: Master raised alarm and crew mustered

properties.incident_details: Robbers armed with long knives boarded the ship at anchor. Duty watch keeper sighted the robbers and informed the duty officer who raised ship’s alarm and mustered crew.  On investigating, the crew saw the forecastle door open and a rope ladder rigged. The robbers had broken into the forecastle store and stolen ship’s stores. The robbers escaped
properties.consequences_for_crew_etc: Ship's stores stolen

properties.incident_details: Six pirates armed with knives and machetes boarded the tanker underway from astern using ropes. They entered the accommodation, went to the bridge and took hostage duty officer, hit him on his head and tied up his hands. They then took him to Master’s cabin, where the pirates stole cash and personal belongings of Master and duty officer. They then went to chief officer’s cabin and stole personal belongings. The pirates then took the Captain on deck and held him prisoner until they disembarked into their boat and escaped
properties.consequences_for_crew_etc: Pirates assaulted duty officer, stole cash money and crew's personal belongings

properties.incident_details: Three robbers armed with long knives boarded the ship at anchor via the forecastle by using a rope and hook. The robbers threatened the forward duty A/B who raised the alarm and retreated into the accommodation. Crew mustered and went forward to check. Upon seeing the crew the robbers jumped overboard and escaped with ship’s equipment
properties.consequences_for_crew_etc: Robbers threatened the duty A/B and stole ship’s equipment

properties.incident_details: Four robbers in a small boat boarded the ship at anchor from the stern. The robbers tied up the duty A/B and took him to the engine-room where they tied up the duty oiler at knife point. They stole engine spares and escaped
properties.consequences_for_crew_etc: Robbers tied up two duty crew and took them as hostages. Engine spares stolen

properties.incident_details: Ten robbers armed with knives and crowbars boarded the ship underway. They entered the bridge and threatened the duty officer and an A/B and ordered them not to sound the alarm.  The robbers forced their way into the captain’s cabin, tied his hands and threatened him with knives. They stole ship’s cash and crew's personal belongings and escaped
properties.consequences_for_crew_etc: Robbers threatened the duty officer and an A/B. They tied the Master’s hands and threatened him with knives. Ship's cash and crew's personal belongings stolen

properties.incident_details: Robbers armed with knives and swords in a small fishing boat boarded the tanker underway. They tried to enter into the accommodation, but were unable as all doors were locked. Upon hearing the alarm and seeing the crew alertness they jumped overboard and escaped
properties.action_taken_by_master_crew: Raised alarm and crew mustered. Informed ships in the vicinity

properties.incident_details: One robber armed with a knife attempted to board the tanker at anchor. Alert duty crew saw a hook stuck on poop deck. The robber tried to climb the rope.  Duty watch immediately informed bridge and general alarm was raised and crew mustered.  On hearing the alarm the robber escaped
properties.consequences_for_crew_etc: Alarm raised and crew mustered

properties.incident_details: Four robbers in a white coloured speedboat approached the ship underway at 20-25 knots. Master raised alarm, sounded ship’s whistle continuously and crew activated fire hoses. Master altered course several times to evade approach. The robbers made two attempts to get close and finally aborted the chase
properties.action_taken_by_master_crew: Master raised alarm, altered course several times , sounded ship’s whistle and crew activated fire hoses

properties.incident_details: Robbers boarded the ship at anchor. They stole ship’s stores and escaped unnoticed
properties.consequences_for_crew_etc: Ship's stores stolen
properties.action_taken_by_master_crew: Raised the alarm and alerted all crew

properties.incident_details:
Four pirates, armed with guns and spears in a speedboat chased the ship. Master took
anti-piracy measures and prevented boarding
properties.action_taken_by_master_crew: Raised alarm, crew mustered and activated anti-piracy measures

properties.incident_details: Five robbers armed with knives boarded the ship unnoticed. They tied-up the hands and feet of the duty A/B and stole ship’s property and stores.  Alarm raised and crew alerted. Robbers escaped with stolen items
properties.consequences_for_crew_etc: Ship's stores stolen

properties.incident_details: Pirates in ten speed boats attempted to approach the ship from the port side, starboard side and stern. After 20 minutes of being chased, the pirates abandoned attempt boarding
properties.action_taken_by_master_crew: Sounded ship’s whistle and crew mustered crew

properties.incident_details: Robbers armed with long knives boarded the ship and entered the engine room. Watch keepers noticed the robbers, but did not take any action. Robbers broke open spare parts boxes and stole engine spares and escaped
properties.consequences_for_crew_etc: Engine spares parts were stolen

properties.incident_details: Four robbers in a speedboat approached the ship at anchor from the port quarter. One robber boarded by using a hook attached to a rope. He was spotted by the deck watchman. Alarm raised and the robber escaped
The robbers attempted to board the ship through the anchor chain. The OOW shouted at the robbers and told them to leave
properties.action_taken_by_master_crew: The OOW shouted at the robbers and told them to leave. Master informed the company

properties.incident_details: Robbers boarded the ship by breaking open the hawse pipe cover. They entered the forecastle and stole ship’s property and escaped
properties.consequences_for_crew_etc: Ship’s property stolen

properties.incident_details: Robber attempted to climb up the ship's anchor chain. Crew spotted him and informed the bridge. Alarm raised and ship’s whistle sounded. Robber jumped into the water and escaped
properties.action_taken_by_master_crew: Alarm raised and sounded ship’s whistle

properties.incident_details: Four robbers armed with long knives boarded the ship at anchor. Duty AB returning after rounds to the forecastle deck saw one robber coming out from port side entrance and immediately informed OOW and raised the alarm. Robbers escaped with ship’s equipment
properties.consequences_for_crew_etc: Ship’s equipment was stolen

properties.incident_details: While underway the tug ATLANTIC 3, towing the barge ATLANTIC 5, lost contact with the owners. It appears that the tug and barge have been hijacked.  Both have been successfully recovered on 19 May 2010 by Philippine military and law enforcement authorities
properties.coastal_state_action_taken: The Philippine military and law enforcement authorities recovered the tug and barge on 19 May 2010

properties.incident_details: About 12 pirates armed with knives in a speedboat boarded the ship underway. They entered the bridge and held the duty officer hostage. They then entered the Master’s cabin and stole ship’s property and escaped. Master sent SSAS alert
properties.consequences_for_crew_etc: Duty officer was taken hostage. Ship’s property was stolen
properties.action_taken_by_master_crew: Security broadcast VHF CH.16, sent SSAS alert

properties.incident_details: Eight pirates armed with long knives boarded the ship underway from a speedboat. The pirates wore shorts and t-shirts with one wearing a mask. Nine of the crew members were rounded up in the wheel house and tied up before taking the Master and six other crew members to their cabins to ransack their personal belongings. After about 1 hr. 20 mins. the pirates escaped
properties.consequences_for_crew_etc: Crew members were tied. Crew’s cash and personal belongings were stolen
properties.action_taken_by_master_crew: Reported he incident to MRCC in China, Malaysia, Indonesia and Thailand and Singapore’s Port Operation and Control Centre

properties.incident_details: Eight robbers armed with knives boarded the ship underway from a speedboat. They held duty officer hostage and entered Master’s cabin. They stole ship's property and crew's personal belongings and escaped
properties.consequences_for_crew_etc: Duty Officer was held hostage. Ship's property and crew's personal belonging were stolen

properties.incident_details: Six pirates in a speedboat armed with knives boarded the ship underway from the stern. They entered the Master’s cabin and held the Master as hostage. The robbers stole ship's cash and crew's personal belongings and escaped
properties.consequences_for_crew_etc: Master was taken hostage. Ship's cash and crew's personal belongings were stolen

properties.incident_details: Eight robbers in a speedboat armed with pistols and knives boarded the ship underway. They entered the bridge and took hostage and tied up the 2/O and the duty A/B. The 2/O was taken to the Master’s cabin and forced to call the Master. When the Master opened the door, the robbers entered his cabin, threatened him with knives and demanded petty cash. They tied up the Master, stole his personal belongings and ship’s cash and property, and escaped
properties.consequences_for_crew_etc: Master and 2/O, A/B were tied up and taken hostage. Ship’s cash, property and crew's personal belongings were stolen

properties.incident_details: Nine pirates attempted to board the ship underway. Alert watchman sighted the pirates and raised the alarm. The duty officer took evasive manoeuvres and shouted at the pirates.  The pirates abandoned attempted boarding
properties.action_taken_by_master_crew: Alert duty raised alarm. Duty officer took evasive manoeuvres

properties.incident_details: Master lost contact with shipowner when the ship was en route from Davao, Philippines, to Palau Islands, Indonesia on 17 July 2010
properties.consequences_for_crew_etc: Ship missing

properties.incident_details: Robbers boarded the ship at anchor. They broke into the paint locker and stole ship's stores and escaped
properties.consequences_for_crew_etc: Ship’s stores stolen

properties.incident_details: Three masked pirates in a high-speed boat approached the tug underway. 2/O raised alarm and informed the Master. Crew activated fire monitors. Pirates attempted to attack at port quarter of the tug. Master took evasive manoeuvres and crew activated water spray. Pirates abandoned attempted boarding
properties.action_taken_by_master_crew: Master took evasive manoeuvres. 2/O raised alarm and crew activated fire monitors and water spray

properties.incident_details: Pirates in four boats approached the ship underway. Ship's watchkeepers raised the alarm. Crew activated fire hoses, showed signal light. Master increased speed and took evasive manoeuvres. After 30 minutes pirates moved away
properties.action_taken_by_master_crew: Crew activated fire hoses and showed signal light. Master increased speed and took evasive manoeuvres

properties.incident_details: Two robbers armed with knives boarded the ship at anchor. Robbers threatened the duty watchmen with knives.  Duty officer raised alarm and contacted port authorities. Robbers escaped empty handed
properties.consequences_for_crew_etc: Duty  watchmen threatened with knives

properties.incident_details: Six pirates armed with long knives boarded the ship underway. They entered the bridge and tied up the 2/O and the duty A/B. Pirates broke into the Master’s cabin, tied up the Master and threatened him with long knives. They stole ship’s cash, property and crew's personal belongings and escaped
properties.consequences_for_crew_etc: Duty A/B and 2/O tied up, Master threatened with long knives, and ship's cash, property and crew's personal belongings stolen

properties.incident_details: Six pirates armed with long knives boarded the ship underway. They forced all crew down and demanded money. Pirates stole ship’s cash and escaped
properties.consequences_for_crew_etc: Ship's cash stolen

properties.incident_details:
Six pirates armed with long knives boarded the ship underway from the stern. They took control of the bridge and tied up the bridge duty and 
anti-piracy watch. They went to Master’s cabin and damaged the cabin door. Master raised the alarm and escaped through the porthole. Crew mustered. Pirates stole ship’s property and escaped
properties.consequences_for_crew_etc: Two crew members tied up. Ship's property stolen

properties.incident_details: Six pirates armed with guns and long knives boarded the ship underway at portside. They rushed to the bridge, held the D/O and an A/B. One pirate remained at bridge to watch over the 3/O and two pirates searched the tanker. Three pirates took one A/B to the Master’s cabin and intimidated the Master. The pirates ransacked the C/E’s cabin. Anti-piracy crew raised the alarm and mustered. Upon seeing crew alertness, pirates held C/E and tied him up. Pirates stole cash and crew's personal belongings before escaping
properties.consequences_for_crew_etc: Ship's cash and crew's personal belongings stolen

properties.incident_details: Six pirates armed with iron rods, long knives and pistols boarded the ship from starboard quarter poop deck while underway. They tied up three crew members including the Master. Pirates stole ship's cash and crew's personal belongings and escaped
properties.consequences_for_crew_etc: Crew tied up. Ship's cash and crew's personal belongings stolen
properties.action_taken_by_master_crew: Activated SSAS and reported incident to the company’s CSO

properties.incident_details: Pirates boarded the ship. Prior to entering high risk area crew locked all access to accommodation and bridge. OOW raised alarm and all crew mustered. Pirates escaped
Robbers boarded the ship. Crew had locked access to accommodation and bridge. OOW raised alarm and all crew mustered. Robbers escaped
Four pirates armed with long knives boarded the ship underway. They held duty bridge crew and proceeded to Master’s cabin. Pirates stole ship’s cash and escaped
properties.consequences_for_crew_etc: Ship's cash stolen

properties.incident_details: One pirate armed with a knife tried to board the ship at poop deck on port side using a hook. He was discovered by A/B and cook on patrol who informed bridge. Alarm was raised, crew mustered and deck lights switched on. Pirate escaped in a boat
properties.action_taken_by_master_crew: Alarm raised, crew mustered and switched on deck lights

properties.incident_details: About eight pirates armed with long knives boarded the ship underway. They tied up the Master and some crew members. Pirates stole ship’s property and crew's personal belongings before escaping
properties.consequences_for_crew_etc: Master and crew tied up. Ship’s property and crew's personal belongings stolen

properties.incident_details: Twelve pirates armed with knives boarded the tug towing a barge. Crew enforced anti-piracy measures and contacted owners who requested assistance. When pirates could not enter the tug's accommodation they boarded the barge.  Pirates stole ship’s stores and equipment
properties.consequences_for_crew_etc: Ship’s stores stolen

properties.incident_details: Six pirates armed with long knives boarded the ship underway. They tied up three crew members and forced entry into Master’s cabin. The OOW saw the robbers, ran up to the bridge, raised alarm, announced over the PA system and transmitted security message via VHF channel 16. One crew was slightly injured on the neck and another had his hands tied. The pirates stole cash and crew's personal belongings and escaped
properties.consequences_for_crew_etc: One crew member injured, 3 crew taken hostage, ship's cash and crew's personal belongings stolen
properties.action_taken_by_master_crew: Alarm raised and security message transmitted on vhf ch 16

properties.incident_details: Four robbers boarded the ship at anchor. Duty motorman noticed that the engine store room padlock was broken and he raised alarm. The robbers stole ship's property and escaped
properties.consequences_for_crew_etc: Ship's property stolen

properties.incident_details: Two robbers boarded the ship at anchor. They broke the forward store's padlock. Duty crew raised alarm. Robbers jumped overboard and escaped
properties.consequences_for_crew_etc: Ship's stores stolen

properties.incident_details: Robbers boarded the ship at anchor. They broke into the steering gear room and stole tanker’s property. Duty 2/O on safety and security rounds noticed bare-foot marks near the steering gear room and engine room and raised alarm. Robbers escaped
properties.consequences_for_crew_etc: Ships' property stolen
properties.reported_to: Indonesian Navy and Marine Police, IFC Singapore

properties.incident_details: Eleven robbers armed with long knives in two wooden boats came alongside the tug towing an empty barge underway. They boarded the tug and demanded marine gas oil (MGO). Crew refused to give MGO as the tug needed it to reach Palembang. The robbers took three drums of MGO and escaped
properties.consequences_for_crew_etc: Crew threatened and MGO stolen

properties.incident_details: Six pirates armed with long knives boarded the ship underway. They entered the bridge, tied up six watch keepers and took them to Master’s cabin. Pirates stole ship’s cash and personal belongings and escaped
properties.consequences_for_crew_etc: Ship’s cash and crew's personal belongings stolen

properties.incident_details: Eight pirates armed with long knives boarded the ship. They stole ship’s cash and crew's personal belongings and escaped
properties.consequences_for_crew_etc: Ship’s cash and crew's personal belongings stolen

properties.incident_details: Two robbers armed with knives boarded the ship at berth while two other robbers were waiting in their boat. Duty crew sighted the robbers at forecastle cutting the ship’s mooring rope. Alarm was raised and crew mustered. Robbers escaped with stores
properties.consequences_for_crew_etc: Ship's stores stolen

properties.incident_details: Six pirates armed with knives boarded the ship underway. Pirates entered the mess room and took the A/B hostage. Later they entered the Master’s cabin and stole ship’s cash and Master’s personal belongings. The pirates took the Master and the A/B to the poop deck, tied them to a winch and escaped in a waiting boat. After the Master and A/B released themselves, the Master went to the bridge where the duty officer indicated that he was not aware of the incident
properties.consequences_for_crew_etc: Master and A/B were tied up and ship’s cash and Master’s personal belongings stolen

properties.incident_details: Three robbers boarded the ship and attempting to access forward stores lockers

Five robbers armed with long knives boarded the ship at anchor. They held duty watchman and threatened him with knives. Three robbers entered the accommodation and stole ship’s property from the safety locker. The robbers escaped in a waiting speed boat
properties.consequences_for_crew_etc: One crew member threatened with knives and ship's property stolen

properties.incident_details: Pirates in an unlit wooden boat attempted to board the ship underway equipped with razor wire as a defense. Master raised alarm and crew directed searchlights towards the boat. The pirates moved away
properties.action_taken_by_master_crew: Raised alarm and crew directed searchlights

properties.incident_details: Robbers boarded the ship at anchor via anchor chain hosepipe. They stole ship's stores and escaped
properties.consequences_for_crew_etc: Ship’s stores stolen

properties.incident_details: Three robbers were noticed on poop deck. The crew members were alerted. The robbers escaped
properties.action_taken_by_master_crew: Alarm sounded and crew members alerted

properties.incident_details: Robbers boarded the ship at anchor via poop deck. The robbers stole ship’s stores and escaped
properties.consequences_for_crew_etc: Ship's stores stolen

properties.incident_details: Five robbers armed with machetes boarded the tug boat from a speed boat while towing Indonesian-registered barge Pac Rupat enroute from Pekan Baru to Singapore. The robbers tied up the crew and stole cash, radios, GPS and handphones and escaped
properties.consequences_for_crew_etc: Crew were tied up. Crew's personal belongings and ship's property were stolen

properties.incident_details: Eight armed pirates in a high speed boat approached the ship underway. Alert crew informed D/O who raised alarm, activated SSAS and anti-piracy measures. Upon seeing the crew alertness, pirates abandoned attempted boarding
properties.action_taken_by_master_crew: Raised alarm, activated SSAS alert and enforced anti-piracy measures

properties.incident_details: Robbers boarded the ship at anchor. Master raised the alarm. Robbers escaped with ship’s stores
properties.consequences_for_crew_etc: Ship’s stores stolen

properties.incident_details: Four robbers in boats attempted to board the ship underway. Master raised alarm, crew mustered on bridge and shouted loudly, flashed aldis lamp, increased speed and took evasive measures. Eventually robbers moved away.
properties.action_taken_by_master_crew: Raised alarm, crew mustered on bridge and shouted loudly, flashed Aldis lamp,  increased speed and took evasive measures

properties.incident_details: Eight robbers armed with long knives in a speed boat boarded the ship underway. The robbers held the duty officer and brought him to the Master’s cabin. They stole ship’s cash, property and Master’s personal belongings and escaped
properties.consequences_for_crew_etc: Duty Officer was held at knife point and ship’s cash, property and Master’s personal belongings were stolen

properties.incident_details: Robbers boarded the ship at anchor. They broke padlocks at the bosun store and stole ship's stores and escaped
properties.consequences_for_crew_etc: Ship's store stolen

properties.incident_details: Five robbers in a boat approached the ship at anchor. One of the robbers attempted to climb on board using a fire wire. Duty crew informed the rest of the crew members. Robbers abandoned attempted boarding and escaped
properties.action_taken_by_master_crew: Duty crew informed the rest of the crew members

properties.incident_details: Three robbers boarded the ship at anchor. The robbers entered the engine room by breaking the padlock to the steering gear room entrance. One of the robbers threatened the 3rd/Eng with a knife and pushed him to the corner of the store room. The oiler on duty saw the robbers and ran towards the control room and raised alarm. The robbers escaped

Ten masked robbers in three speed boats armed with pistols, parangs and knives boarded the tanker while sailing from Surabaya to Samarinda, Indonesia. The robbers tied up the crew, locked them in the galley and took control of the ship for five days until it anchored off Pulau Mungging, Malaysia (7.22 NM from Horsburg Lighthouse). On 19.04.2011, the robbers ordered one of the crew to unload about 800 ltrs of diesel. The robbers stole ship’s navigation and communication equipment (GPS and AIS system, VHF set and charts) and some handphones before escaping
properties.consequences_for_crew_etc: Personal belongings and ship's communication equipment stolen

properties.incident_details: About six to seven robbers in a wooden boat approached the ship at anchor. One robber boarded the ship. Duty deck crew informed OOW. Alarm raised and crew mustered. The robber jumped overboard and escaped

Three armed robbers boarded the ship at anchor via the poop deck and took hostage the 3rd Engineer. They entered the engine room and stole ship's property. Duty oiler saw the robbers and informed the bridge who raised the alarm. Robbers escaped
properties.consequences_for_crew_etc: 3rd Engineer held hostage and ship's property stolen
